about_the_game: The Mischief Demo is a delightful and imaginative action/adventure video game where you step into the paws of a courageous rat, navigating through a captivating world within the nooks and crannies of a bustling backyard. In solo or cooperative play with up to four players, you'll face whimsical boss characters like Shovul, Scourge of the Sandbox, a sandbox toy monstrosity, Oscar, Pup of the Pit, the feisty hot dog on the grill, and the cheeky garden-dwelling Moles, Avogadro and Freckle, The Garden Guardians. As you meet these quirky foes, utilize a variety of household objects, such as crayons, forks, paperclips, ketchup, and more to defeat or befriend them. Unearth hidden surprises, including intricate platforming courses, racing mini-games, and hidden adventures, making Mischief an enchanting adventure suitable for all ages.
